data.name: I Will Survive
lyrics: At first I was afraid, I was petrified
Kept thinking I could never live without you by my side
But then I spent so many nights thinking how you did me wrong
And I learned how to get along
I just walked in to find you here with that sad look upon your face
I should have changed that stupid lock, I should have made you leave your key
If I'd known for just one second you'd be back to bother me
Go on now, go, walk out the door
Weren't you the one who tried to hurt me with goodbye?
You think I'd lay down and die?
Oh no, not I, I will survive
Oh, as long as I know how to love, I know I'll stay alive
I've got all my life to live
And I've got all my love to give and I'll survive
It took all the strength I had not to fall apart
Kept trying hard to mend the pieces of my broken heart
And I spent oh-so many nights just feeling sorry for myself
But now I hold my head up high and you see me
I'm not that chained-up little person still in love with you
And so you felt like dropping in and just expect me to be free
Well, now I'm saving all my lovin' for someone who's loving me
Go on now, go, walk out the door
Weren't you the one who tried to break me with goodbye?
You think I'd lay down and die?
Oh no, not I, I will survive
Oh, as long as I know how to love, I know I'll stay alive
I've got all my life to live
And I've got all my love to give and I'll survive
Go on now, go, walk out the door
Weren't you the one who tried to break me with goodbye?
You think I'd lay down and die?
Oh no, not I, I will survive
Oh, as long as I know how to love, I know I'll stay alive
I've got all my life to live
And I've got all my love to give and I'll survive

data.name: 7 Nation Army
lyrics: A seven nation army couldn't hold me back
Taking their time right behind my back
And I'm talking to myself at night
Back and forth through my mind
And the message coming from my eyes
Every single one's got a story to tell
From the Queen of England to the Hounds of Hell
And if I catch it coming back my way
I'm gonna serve it to you
And that ain't what you want to hear
And the feeling coming from my bones
Make the sweat drip out of every pore
And I'm bleeding, and I'm bleeding, and I'm bleeding
All the words are gonna bleed from me
And I will sing no more
And the stains coming from my blood

data.name: Hasta siempre
lyrics: Donde el sol de tu bravura
Le puso un cerco a la muerte
Con la luz de tu sonrisa
Esa ola irá creciendo cada día que pase
Esa ola ya no parará más

data.name: Stand by Me
lyrics: And the moon is the only light we'll see
No, I won't be afraid, no, I won't be afraid
Just as long as you stand, stand by me
So darlin', darlin', stand by me, oh, stand by me
Oh, stand, stand by me, stand by me
If the sky that we look upon
Or the mountains should crumble to the sea
I won't cry, I won't cry, no, I won't shed a tear
Just as long as you stand, stand by me
And darlin', darlin', stand by me, oh, stand by me
Whoa, stand now, stand by me, stand by me
Darlin', darlin', stand by me, oh, stand by me
Oh, stand now, stand by me, stand by me
Whenever you're in trouble, won't you stand by me? Oh, stand by me

data.name: Otherwise
lyrics: Just to show you my face
But when it comes to the crunch
But I know you're the same
'Cause you got to be seen to be playing the game
Yes we got to be seen to be playing, the game
If you open up your eyes
I thought that you were wise
I asked a tedious guy if he'll tell me your name
I wanna take out your love
But it's locked in a vault
I wanna take up your love
But it's locked in a vault
If you open up your eyes
I thought that you were wise
And I can't expect that kind of love from you
And I can't extract the pain you're going through
If you open up your eyes
If you open up your eyes
I thought that you were wise
